channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 10:37 Dumping anxiety in the Chernihiv region.Creck on further messages.
item.description: 🟢 10:37 Dumping anxiety in the Chernihiv region.Creck on further messages.#Chernihiv This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟠 10:02 Free evacuation will urgently evacuate from the war zone or dangerous territory of Kharkiv region. A 24 -hour free hotline for evacuation of civilian population - 0800339291

item.title: 🟡 08:52 Drawing of anxiety in Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that anxiety is still in:- Mirovskaya Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivska Territorial Community
